editorialSummary.text: Straightforward storefront offering classic haircuts & styles for men & children.

originalText.text: George is a legend. He's giving me the best haircuts I've ever gotten in my entire life. AND at an extremely reasonable price. You can find his appointments on Booksy. Cannot recommend him enough.

text.text: George is a legend. He's giving me the best haircuts I've ever gotten in my entire life. AND at an extremely reasonable price. You can find his appointments on Booksy. Cannot recommend him enough.

originalText.text: Visiting from St Louis and wish we could come here every month! Heim did a great job! Perfect cut and straight razor shave! Customer service was amazing!

text.text: Visiting from St Louis and wish we could come here every month! Heim did a great job! Perfect cut and straight razor shave! Customer service was amazing!

originalText.text: Great shave by Jose. First time and won’t be last.

text.text: Great shave by Jose. First time and won’t be last.

originalText.text: Henry was patient and social with my kid. He made him feel comfortable and was meticulous with his work and ensuring he wasn't too squirmy because of loose hairs etc. Even when my kid fell asleep, he just went with it. He also double checked with me throughout the haircut to make sure we were happy with the outcome. We will be sure to share and recommend to our friends and neighbors. Also, super easy online booking made it less stress for a busy paren. Thanks, Henry.

text.text: Henry was patient and social with my kid. He made him feel comfortable and was meticulous with his work and ensuring he wasn't too squirmy because of loose hairs etc. Even when my kid fell asleep, he just went with it. He also double checked with me throughout the haircut to make sure we were happy with the outcome. We will be sure to share and recommend to our friends and neighbors. Also, super easy online booking made it less stress for a busy paren. Thanks, Henry.

originalText.text: This is a men's barber shop but I take my little boy here for his haircuts. It's a tiny, clean, newly renovated space on an out of the way street. George is a quiet, hard working gentleman. He's great with kids & has a booster seat for small children. He makes my son look fantastic and is well aware of the tricks & allowances necessary to get a baby boy to sit long enough to be well groomed. He gets us in & out quickly. He also uses a very convenient online appointment booking program so you know exactly when he's available.
